name: SYNCAL™ OB407PAO
description: Syncal™ OB407PAO is a specialty overbased calcium sulfonate that is designed for use in applications where the benefits of PAO are desired. The calcium-to-sulfonate ratio is optimized for good compatibility with other componentry. The product lends itself to a variety of applications including those where low temperature properties are needed. Syncal™ OB407PAO is a good choice for overbased calcium sulfonate grease feed. The high TBN offers good acid neutralizing and rust and corrosion inhibiting characteristics. This product can be considered as a component in a variety of lubricating oils and greases, coatings, rust preventives, metalworking fluids, and automotive lubricants.
